categories: Category:Venator-class Star Destroyers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: The Vensenor was a Venator-class Star Destroyer that housed the Vensenor Flight Academy on Arkanis.

The vessel was one of several Venators used by the Imperial Navy to host mobile flight schools for Imperial pilots. The Vensenor Flight Academy, a branch of the Imperial Academy, subsequently became well-known and earned prestige among pilots.
